mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_plans(title, is_public, description, user_id) VALUES ( #{title}, #{is_public}, #{description}, (SELECT id FROM users WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) );

INSERT INTO travel_plan_items(note, `order`, plan_id, content_id) VALUES
(#{item.note}, #{item.order}, #{id}, #{item.content_id})
mapper.select: select * from travel_plans where id=#{id} and user_id=#{user_id}

select t.id, t.note, a.content_id, a.title, a.gugun_code, a.sido_code, a.content_type_id, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.addr1, t.`order` from travel_plan_items as t left join attractions as a on a.content_id = t.content_id where plan_id = #{id};

select * from travel_plans order by created_at asc
limit #{page_start}, #{page_size};

select * from travel_plans order by created_at desc
limit #{page_start}, #{page_size};

select * from travel_plans order by view_cnt desc
limit #{page_start}, #{page_size};
select * from travel_plan_comments where parent_comment_id is null order by created_at;
mapper.insert: insert into travel_plan_comments (plan_id, user_id, comment, created_at, updated_at, parent_comment_id) values(#{plan_id}, #{user_id}, #{comment}, #{created_at}, #{updated_at}, #{parent_comment_id});
mapper.select: select tp.* from travel_plans tp join plans_favorites pf on tp.id = pf.plan_id where pf.user_id = #{id};
mapper.delete: delete from plans_favorites where plan_id=#{plan_id} and user_id=#{user_id}
